metadata.title: CVE-2021-44502 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in FIS GT.M through V7.0-000 (related to theYottaDB code base). Using crafted input, an attacker can control the sizeof a memset that occurs in calls to util_format in sr_unix/util_output.c.

criterions.comment: fis-gtm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
